The ship would never make it that far, as a massive storm struck a day or so into the cruise, catching everyone unaware. The ocean was so strong, it pulled the ship into an extremely fast current, taking the ship due south and below the equator. They were now in the middle of the Southern Pacific Ocean in a place the ocean currents usually go.

"We were twins," Jasmine countered. "Something last night made us the same person." Jasmine placed her nails on her arm and scratched. "See"

Jasmine looked down at her own hand as the scratches appeared out of nowhere. "Wow that's wild." Jasmine said as she examined the marks. "So who's our boyfriend then?"

"It's...." Jasmine had to think about it
12433.title: I have the same scar

125.content:
The storm had struck so quickly and the seas were so rough a large number of passengers had been knocked overboard. Though they were all relatively safe and had somehow managed stay within range of the ship. There wasn't an exact count of everyone who had fallen into the water though and the process to getting them out was taking longer than it should have.

A few people had already been taken out of the water and rushed to the medical section of the ship, while plenty more were still in the cold, lifeless water.

While the crew of the ship tried hard to rescue these passengers, they'd soon wish they hadn't.

Where does this start?
125.title: Someone who fell overboard

choices: He finds that he can change other people
He finds that he has changed
1251.content:
Zachary felt like this was all a dream, or rather a nightmare. Reality didn't feel real to him anymore. Not since he fell into the dark and empty waters.

He had been one of the first to be pulled back in, but everywhere that the water touched still felt cold to him. Then there was the presence he felt, the dark and shadowy presence. He knew it was watching him from the ocean floor, even though it was impossibly deep. He saw the two giant red eyes staring at him from below, when he first submerged. When he closed his eyes now, that's all he could see.

Nothing would be the same for Zachary, he had been touched by the shadow of the deep, even now he could hear its whispers. There was no hope for anyone now, not in the water or aboard the ship. The Shadow had them. Zachary knew this and so did the other patients. He could tell they knew, he knew they were touched like he was.

His own thoughts were drowned out now as he could only hear a single thing. It was demanding change, though was it for him or someone else?
1251.title: Someone waking up in medbay

12511.content:
"Hey watch this..." a girl next to Zachary said. She was one of the others that had fallen overboard with him though she had been pulled out sooner. Her eyes seemed shallow by she also seemed to be in good spirits. Zachary turned to her and she pointed to a guy that was unconscious with a bandage wrapped around his head. Zach watched as the guy turned into a woman before his very eyes. "Pretty cool huh?"

"How did you do that?" Zachary asked, the voices in his head grew louder, demanding a change.

"You should know, you've been touched too..." the girl informs him. "Go ahead try it, it makes the voices go quiet."

Zachary did know. Somehow everyone that ended up in that water had been touched by the darkness and now they could manipulate reality. Though was Zachary really going to use this power. "I really shouldn't..." Zachary says looking at the former man. The voices in his head screamed when he said that, causing him physical pain.

"Why not? She's unconscious, she's an easy target," the woman gave a devilish smile. "No one is going to notice but you and me." Zachary focused on the woman and tried to turn her back into a man but that not only caused him pain but the woman as well. "I guess you can't undo what I did..." she says giving him an annoyed glare. "Also don't be so nice, have some fun..."

Zachary nods and focused once again, he...
12511.title: He finds that he can change other people

choices: The island crashed into the ship and fused with it
There was a hooded figure on the island
There seemed to be a settlement on the island
There was life on the island
13.content:
The Exotic Adventure had been sitting idle in the water for a few days. The power was out and people had been hearing strange noises and dreaming strange things. There were rumors among the crew that the ship was completely stranded and no help was on its way. Food was starting to be rationed and there were strict curfews for everyone.

On the third day stranded as sea, there was a magnificent sight on the starboard side of the ship. A giant floating island could be seen off in the distance. It took another two days for it to get close enough to the ship.

The island wasn't natural in anyway and should not have been remotely possible. It was made of metal and wires with solar panels and other bits and pieces, it was completely flat and the metal had fused together in weird ways. Several country flags could be seen in the twisted metal, this was made up of more than one satellite and it should not have been floating.

It was a nice distraction from the doom the Exotic Adventure would meet, as the island shouldn't have been a source of salvation though something changed all that
13.title: They find an Island made of Satellites

choices: A World War Two Battle Ship
A pirate ship from the 17th centuary
14.content:
The Exotic Adventure had been adrift for a day now and the passengers were allowed to return to their cabins. The power was still out across the ship, though the crew ensured that them everything would be alright. They had been told that the power would be restored and help was on the way.

Up in the bridge it was a different story, the navigation crew were trying to figure out where they are as it was impossible for them to be where the instruments said they were. If it were true there was no hope of rescue coming in time. They weren't even sure if they got the ship up and running again, if they could make it to safety before their resources ran out.

Their spirits were lifted when they saw a shadow of another ship off in the distance. Perhaps their instruments were wrong, perhaps they were closer to land than they thought. They couldn't radio the other ship, so they fired their flares hoping to get their attention. It seemed to have worked as the ship started to move closer towards them.

There was something strange about this other ship though and when it moved closer the crew couldn't believe their eyes, it was...
14.title: Another ship approaches

141.content:
At first it seemed like the ship on the horizon was intentionally sailing towards them but as it got closer, they soon noticed it wasn't. Like them the ship was dead in the water and it was just the flow of the ocean bring them together. The ship looked extremely familiar too because it was the one they were on. Drifting towards them was another Exotic Adventure.

By now it had come close enough that people were able to recognize it as the same ship they were on. The ship was abuzz in panic and speculation as they wondered what it could possibly mean.

They would find out in a few hours when the two ships came close enough for people to cross.

The weirdest part about this second ship is....
141.title: The Exotic Adventure

1413.content:
Was there anyone aboard this second ship or had it been completely abandoned. If it was empty what dangerous could emerge for those who boarded the second vessel?

Or was it exactly the same, no different from their current ship, all the people in the same position. If they interacted would anything strange happen or would they all act exactly the same?
1413.title: Something else

info.brief_description: A Cruise ship finds itself stuck out at sea and those on board begin to change.
info.description:
This is an adults only cruise line, targeted at young people in their early twenties. It is on its maiden voyage sailing from California, down to South America when it was hit by a freak storm. It is now impossibly off course as all navigational tools seem to indicate the ship is near point Nemo (the furthest place from land in the ocean).

The storm and their co-ordinates are the least of their worries though, as strange happenings begin to occur on the ship with every day bringing some new kind of change.

Rules
Death of any of the characters are fine. Though that doesn't mean the story has to end, new victims can be discovered and death can be reversed

When dealing with characters under the age of 18, be mindful how you treat them, I will not tolerate any nudity or sex and these chapters will be deleted. I'd rather not have anyone under age but that does remove the ability for age regression.

Be mindful of other people when writing, leaving as many options available as possible. If you can only add two paths I'd rather you do 'more options' as the second choice allowing for others to add their own ideas. On that note be careful how long you make your chapters, they shouldn't be too short however they should also leave room for choice. So don't write too many transformations or actions in a single chapter where another choice was available.

I am impulsive and do change my mind often so do except to see the occasional change in the structure of the interactive or some of my additions being edited. I will try not to delete chapters and if an idea I thought of gets taken I will use the more options or edit the choices so both out ideas for that choice can be expressed. (On that note, if anyone wanted to add to a particular option that was taken feel free to repeat that choice with your own idea).
